lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic paused after accepting the Rogers Cup trophy for the fourth time, scanned the stands Sunday at York University's Aviva Centre and asked everyone in the crowd to hug the person beside them.
snippet: Novak Djokovic paused after accepting the Rogers Cup trophy for the fourth time, scanned the stands Sunday at York University's Aviva Centre and asked everyone in the crowd to hug the person beside them....

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Beats Kei Nishikori for 4th Rogers Cup Title
headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Beats Kei Nishikori for 4th Rogers Cup Title
